home.title: Need to reinforce your vocabulary in other languages?
home.intro: Vocabys is an experimental application that combines the curiosity of learning new languages with the potential of generative AI.

card1.title: Problem
card1.description: One of the biggest challenges to learning a new language is expanding the vocabulary, a fundamental skill for fluency. Without a broad vocabulary, communication becomes limited and frustrating.

card2.title: Solution
card2.description: Utilizing the power of generative AI, Vocabys offers an intuitive and efficient way to expand your vocabulary. With just a few clicks, users have access to words organized by concepts, making it easier to learn new terms and review familiar words.

home.subtitle3: Choose a language and start learning now!
